code: import{axiosClient}from'./axios-client';export var query=function query(){return{product:{getAll:function getAll(){return axiosClient.get('/product');},getFilter:function getFilter(filter){return filter===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/product/filter?'+filter);},getOne:function getOne(id){return id===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/product/'+id);},getSearch:function getSearch(query){return query===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/product/search/'+query);}},category:{getAll:function getAll(){return axiosClient.get('/category');},getFilter:function getFilter(filter){return filter===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/category'+filter);},getOne:function getOne(id){return id===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/category'+id);}},auth:{login:function login(payload){return payload===undefined?null:axiosClient.post('/auth/login',payload);},register:function register(payload){return payload===undefined?null:axiosClient.post('/register',payload);}},comment:{getListByProductId:function getListByProductId(productId){return productId===undefined?null:axiosClient.get('/comment/'+productId);},add:function add(payload){return payload===undefined?null:axiosClient.post('/comment/add',payload);}}};};
